div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1160 Didyma, Ionia, 1968 Burial: c. 550 B.C. (Pfeiler) Contents: 5 EL Miletus (panther hd.): 1 sixth Unc. mint (lion hd. facing): 1 twenty- fourth (lion paw/scorpion): 1 forty- eighth (without types): 1 twenty- fourth; 1 forty-eighth Disposition: dispersed
